subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-west-2)

messages.content:
Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in admin-dashboard (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

The admin-dashboard service in the us-west-2 region is experiencing critical performance issues due to high load times averaging 5172.71 ms. This is likely caused by an increased bundle size of 213.9 KB and the loading of 18 resources, which exceeds acceptable thresholds. The degraded performance is affecting user experience, leading to potential frustration and abandonment of the dashboard. This issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: admin-dashboard
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 5172.71,
  "bundle_size_kb": 213.9,
  "resources_loaded": 18
}

Workaround: Investigate recent changes in bundle size and resource loading. Optimize frontend assets by reducing bundle size and implementing lazy loading for resources to improve performance.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.

extracted_fields.requested_action: immediate attention to the critical performance issue

current_routing.reasoning: Routed to engineering due to bug classification. SLA set based on enterprise tier and P0 priority. Escalated due to P0 critical priority.
